warning.title: This discussion is more than {time} old.
warning.description: It is very likely that it does not need any further discussion and thus bumping it serves no purpose.
warning.checkbox_label: I am aware that this discussion is rather old but would still like to reply.
warning.error: This discussion is too old to reply to.

settings.days_help: A discussion will be marked as old when the amount of days specified has passed since the last post on that discussion was posted. Use 0 to disable it by default.
settings.message_title_help: Use [time] for the time text, e.g. "14 days".
settings.tags_help: Override the global days for a specific tag. Empty means use default value. If a discussion has multiple tags with different day values, it will use the smallest amount of days configured.
